title: issues with oce esports page
body:
there is a reason why people dont get into oce league of legends. for example, i was making a go of it and browsing the esports page for oce and in 5 minutes i came accross multiple basic errors.

1) under "path to pro" the "league page" for ocs and ool are outdated and were published may last year (2016).
2) when navigating "team standings" and then clicking on each team to see the roster, adc is at the top of each list for some reason.
3) the descriptions on the players are outdated as well. trying to find out about abyss support "cuden" just a few minutes ago i learned that "His synergy with bot lane partner Raes is developing quickly, and he's definitely a player to watch in this team (dire wolves)." Huh. didn't realize abyss and dire wolves were the same team - shows how much i know about oce esports. literally none of the players who changed teams have updated bios.

come on riot. this could all be fixed in like 20 minutes - hell, i'll do it for you if you want :P

replies.body:
Hey Burstfire, 

Fair point! We are actually in the process of fixing points 2 and 3 above, but as you can imagine leading into first show day, #1 is a little lower down the list right now. But definitely needs an update!!

Appreciate the flag though and glad to hear that you are searching for more Esports content!
I know this will probably sound super cheesy, but just wanted to chime in and thank you BurstFire303 for the feedback.  I know it's a hassle, and pretty thankless, but it's appreciated.
But let's not kid ourselves here. OCE Esports gets no attention because we hide it away on a separate website instead of giving it its own tab on the proper LoL Esports website.

The OOL and OCS are the same every season so if it was published 2 years ago nothing would of changed unless they've said it in the news which they haven't so it's still relevant.

But yes some times they forget to update it.
OOL and OCS went through significant changes 12 months ago. It needs to be updated

the problem isnt really that its the same thing updated every year so update it pls, its more like its difficult to make plans around scheduling etc if they arent confirmed and a 2017 post would do a lot more to put teams at rest when they tell their players to be available at a certain time.
